title: Jets' Hellebuyck pulls off rare Hart-Vezina double
content: Winnipeg's Connor Hellebuyck has won the Hart Trophy as NHL MVP and the Vezina Trophy as the league's best goaltender.

title: Agent: Skaggs named Reds' Miley as drug supplier
content: The agent of the late Tyler Skaggs said in a deposition that Skaggs told him he was using pain pills containing oxycodone that were provided by Reds left-hander Wade Miley.

title: Spaun atop U.S. Open after only bogey-free round
content: J.J. Spaun shot a first-round 66 at the U.S. Open in his first competitive round at Oakmont Country Club.

title: Jets' Gardner 'bought in,' hopeful about new deal
content: New York Jets cornerback Sauce Gardner wants to stick around for the long term, hoping he can be a catalyst for a dramatic turnaround. It sounds like that wish will come to fruition.

title: Sources: NFL exec Rolapp off to PGA Tour as CEO
content: The PGA Tour is hiring NFL executive vice president Brian Rolapp as its CEO, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter and Seth Wickersham on Thursday.

title: Death of Gardner's son still under investigation
content: More than two months after the death of Miller Gardner, the 14-year-old son of former Yankees outfielder Brett Gardner, authorities in Costa Rica say the case remains under investigation.

title: Raiders praise 'coachable' Jeanty at minicamp
content: Raiders coach Pete Carroll delivered high praise for rookie running back Ashton Jeanty following the final day of minicamp Thursday.

title: Hamilton backs Ferrari boss amid exit reports
content: Lewis Hamilton declared Ferrari team principal Fred Vasseur "the person to take us to the top" amid fresh reports the team is considering sacking him.

title: 🎵 Kevin Love's tribute to legendary Brian Wilson
content: The Miami Heat forward had a close connection to the late Beach Boys co-founder -- who was a family member.

title: What Rick Carlisle learned in Dallas to help him coach Tyrese Haliburton
content: From his time with point guards Jason Kidd and Luka Doncic in Dallas, Rick Carlisle's experience has made him the ideal coach for Tyrese Haliburton.

title: NFL minicamp updates: Cameron Ward throws some picks, Travis Hunter gets reps at CB and WR
content: The majority of NFL mandatory minicamps are in action this week. Our reporters have the latest from around the league.

title: 'A team that can win now': Are Clark, Fever built for WNBA title run?
content: After big offseason pickups, the Fever looked like potential title contenders early. Can they get back on track?

title: Six trades you probably missed at the time that have altered the 2025 MLB season
content: These under-the-radar deals range from a young catcher switching sides in a classic rivalry to a key rotation addition on a World Series contender.

title: Is the USMNT anywhere near ready for the World Cup challenge?
content: With 12 months out from the World Cup and with the Gold Cup kicking off this weekend, is the USMNT ready for its moment in the spotlight?

title: Can Amtrak's busy Northeast Corridor handle the 2026 World Cup?
content: The congested stretch from Boston to Washington is already beleaguered by breakdowns and spotty service.

title: The Road to Omaha: How the MCWS became a town's pride and joy
content: After 75 years, it is impossible to mention the city or event and not immediately think of the other.

title: What every team still needs to answer about its QB situation
content: Will Philly's coordinator swap harm Jalen Hurts? Are Patrick Mahomes and Jayden Daniels set for big years?

title: Our latest NBA mock draft: Back-and-forth on team need vs. best value
content: Best player available? Fill a need? We played out both strategies for 30 first-round slots in the draft.

title: NBA Finals betting: Thunder still favorites despite Game 3 loss
content: With the Pacers up 2-1 on the Thunder in NBA Finals here are the updated odds to win the championship and Finals MVP.

title: Stanley Cup Final odds: Panthers favored to win Game 4, series
content: Top ways to bet the series and props for the Stanley Cup Final between the Florida Panthers and Edmonton Oilers.

title: Whose NHL draft stock rose, declined at the scouting combine?
content: The annual event took place this past week in Buffalo -- with major repercussions for the draft on June 27-28.

title: Pulisic: Former USMNT critics 'way out of line'
content: AC Milan and United States men's national team midfielder Christian Pulisic said that comments from former U.S. players criticizing him for opting to skip the Concacaf Gold Cup are "way out of line."

title: Galatasaray sign Sané as free agent from Bayern
content: Galatasaray have completed a deal to sign Germany winger Leroy Sané from Bayern Munich on a three year contract, the Turkish Super Lig champions announced Thursday.

title: Poland manager quits after Lewandowski dispute
content: Poland manager Michal Probierz resigned  Thursday following a row over his decision to replace the country's record goal scorer Robert Lewandowski as captain.

title: Pep on City: Barça, Madrid would have sacked me
content: Pep Guardiola has said he would have been sacked by Barcelona or Real Madrid if he encountered similar struggles to those he faced at Manchester City this season.

title: U.S. great Michael Bradley named RBNY II coach
content: Former USMNT midfielder Michael Bradley has been hired as head coach of New York Red Bulls II, making it the first managerial role in his nascent coaching career.

title: Sources: Man United still undecided on Højlund
content: Manchester United are yet to make a decision on Rasmus Højlund's future, sources have told ESPN, with all options on the table ahead of the summer transfer window.

title: Sources: Jets owner in Palace talks amid UEL fear
content: Woody Johnson, the owner of the New York Jets NFL team, is in talks over a £200 million ($272m) investment in Crystal Palace, sources have told ESPN.

title: Club World Cup kit rankings: Which team has the best jersey?
content: The Club World Cup is upon us, and all 32 teams are bringing new kits to the tournament. Which ones earned the highest marks?

title: Mock draft: Achane among five RBs to go in top seven picks
content: In our first 12-team mock draft of the offseason, running backs took priority in the early going in this 1/2 PPR setup.

title: Caminero, Grisham hit 30 HRs? Turner steals 50? Don't be surprised
content: Eric Karabell looks into the crystal ball to tell fantasy baseball managers what might come to pass in the not-too-distant future.

title: Max Verstappen ban? How world champion could miss Formula 1 race
content: Max Verstappen heads to the Canadian Grand Prix on the brink of a one-race ban with one more infringement could see him miss out on valuable championship points.

title: Din Thomas, Anthony Smith spilt on Usman vs. Buckley
content: Former UFC fighters give their Kamaru Usman vs. Joaquin Buckley main event picks, and Ian Parker provides betting advice for UFC and PFL events this week.

title: 'Targeted military op': Israel attacks Iran, targets nuclear facilities; US denies involvement
content: Israel launched a military operation against Iran late Thursday, with explosions reported in Tehran. Israel's defense minister confirmed the 'preemptive strikes,' citing Iran's continued uranium enrichment. The US denies involvement, emphasizing the action was Israel's decision and warning Iran against targeting US interests.

title: AI crash: Boeing, a whistleblower, & his 'gap' warning - 'That’s not how ... '
content: Air India Flight AI171, a Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner, crashed shortly after takeoff from Ahmedabad, killing all 242 onboard. The tragedy has brought renewed attention to whistleblower Sam Salehpour's 2024 warnings about structural flaws in the 787 Dreamliner. Salehpour alleged shortcuts in manufacturing could lead to catastrophic failure. Boeing has refuted these claims, stating the aircraft is safe.

title: Air India Ahmedabad crash: How the Black Box is decoded; how many days it takes
content: An Air India Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner crashed shortly after takeoff from Ahmedabad, resulting in over 200 fatalities. The accident, the worst aviation disaster in a decade, prompts an urgent investigation focusing on the aircraft's Black Box.

title: Trump’s immigration shift? What US President said on farm labors; watch video
content: US President Donald Trump hinted at a potential policy shift on immigration, suggesting some undocumented immigrants could stay to prevent labor shortages in agriculture and hospitality. An executive order is being considered to protect farm workers, many of whom lack legal status but have worked for years.

title: Watch: Senator forcibly removed, handcuffed at Noem’s news conference
content: Democratic Senator Alex Padilla was forcibly removed and handcuffed during Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem's Los Angeles press conference, sparking national outrage. Padilla interrupted Noem to question immigration raids, leading to a confrontation where he was pushed to the ground. Democrats condemned the incident as an abuse of power, while Republicans defended Noem, accusing Padilla of inappropriate behavior.

title: Air India Plane crash: Flightradar shares update on ‘safety protocol’ followed
content: Air India Flight AI 171, a Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner, crashed in Meghani Nagar after leaving Ahmedabad. The flight was headed to London with 242 passengers and 12 crew. Flightradar data shows the plane used the full runway length. The pilot made a MAYDAY call. Videos show smoke at the crash site. Emergency services responded quickly.

title: Karisma Kapoor’s ex-husband Sunjay Kapur dies of heart attack while playing polo in UK
content: Indian industrialist Sunjay Kapur, ex-husband of Karisma Kapoor, tragically passed away in the UK at 53. Sources report a fatal heart attack during a polo match, possibly triggered by an insect entering his mouth. Kapur, remembered for his passion for polo and business acumen, leaves behind two children with Karisma. Condolences pour in for the charismatic businessman.

title: 'Dead bodies scattered all over': Eyewitness on Ahmedabad plane crash
content: Tragedy struck Ahmedabad as an Air India flight, en route to London, crashed shortly after takeoff from Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport. The aircraft plummeted into a hostel in the Meghani area, resulting in a massive fire and widespread debris. Eyewitnesses reported a scene of devastation with smoke, scattered debris, and casualties.

title: ‘Housefull 5’ BO collection: Akshay Kumar’s film touches Rs 127 crore
content: Tarun Mansukhani's 'Housefull 5,' starring Akshay Kumar, Riteish Deshmukh, and Abhishek Bachchan, premiered on June 6, 2025, with two versions. Despite mixed reviews, the film opened strongly, earning Rs 127 crore in its first week. However, collections dipped from Day 4, with Day 7 estimated at Rs 6.75 crore, showing a weekday decline in occupancy.

title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang: There’s a new programming language. It is called…
content: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang recently highlighted AI's transformative potential, stating it democratizes programming by enabling users to instruct computers using natural language. He likened programming AI to guiding a person, emphasizing the ease with which AI can now perform complex tasks like writing poems.

title: 'Why was landing gear down? ': Experts on what may have caused Gujarat plane crash
content: An Air India plane crashed in Gujarat. Aviation experts are questioning the incident. The crash occurred shortly after takeoff. Experts emphasize the importance of flight recorders. A former pilot noted a possible loss of power. The landing gear position is unusual. Investigators are working to determine the cause. The aircraft was at 600 feet.

title: AI plane crash: Flyer Vishwashkumar Ramesh makes miraculous escape
content: A London-bound Air India plane carrying 242 people crashed shortly after takeoff from Ahmedabad airport, colliding with a nearby doctors' hostel. Police confirmed one survivor, Ramesh Vishwaskumar, a British national found in seat 11A, is receiving hospital treatment. The death toll is expected to rise due to the crash site being in a residential area.

title: Air India crash: Gujarat ex-CM Vijay Rupani believed 1206 his lucky no.
content: Former Gujarat Chief Minister Vijay Rupani, known for his lucky number 1206, tragically died in a plane crash on June 12, a date mirroring his cherished number. He was en route to London to visit his family, a trip rescheduled due to by-election duties.

title: Ahmedabad man avoids Air India crash by postponing travel, says God saved him
content: An Ahmedabad man, Savjibhai Timbadia, narrowly escaped the Air India crash after postponing his London flight by four days. His son had booked the original flight, and Timbadia believes his decision to delay travel saved his life. The Boeing 787 Dreamliner crashed shortly after takeoff, killing nearly all 242 passengers and crew, including former Gujarat chief minister Vijay Rupani.

title: ‘Her phone still rings’: Family clings to hope for 20-yr-old cabin crew
content: A family in Manipur is desperately seeking information about Kongbrailatpam Nganthoi Sharma. She was a cabin crew member on the Air India flight that crashed in Ahmedabad. The family clings to hope as her phone still rings. Relatives are traveling to Ahmedabad for news. The family is struggling with unverified reports. They await official confirmation amidst their grief.

title: Ahmedabad plane tragedy: Boeing CEO offers condolences; pledges support in crash probe
content: Boeing CEO Kelly Ortberg expressed grief over the Air India Flight 171 tragedy in Ahmedabad. He conveyed support to Air India Chairman N. Chandrasekaran. Boeing will assist the Aircraft Accident Investigation Bureau. The crashed aircraft was Boeing-made. The company will follow ICAO protocol. India's AAIB will lead the investigation. Boeing will provide information related to the incident.

title: ‘That’s my girl’: Caitlin Clark shines amid Bueckers’ record return
content: Caitlin Clark's courtside appearance with Reggie Miller ignited excitement, mirroring the buzz around Paige Bueckers' stellar WNBA performance. Bueckers, returning from injury, scored 35 points, drawing comparisons to Clark and fueling talk of a new rivalry. Their journey from NCAA fame to the WNBA highlights their continued impact, solidifying their status as the league's most exciting duo.

title: WTC Final : AUS in driving seat, lead SA by 218 at stumps on Day 2
content: Australia captain Pat Cummins starred with the ball and Alex Carey made valuable runs following a dramatic collapse as the holders retained the advantage in the World Test Championship final against South Africa on Thursday. The Proteas had resumed on Thursday at 43-4, battling to put enough runs on the board.

title: CCTV footage shows AI171's fatal 30-second flight - from runway to tragedy
content: An Air India Dreamliner, flight AI-171, crashed shortly after takeoff from Ahmedabad, impacting a doctors' hostel near the airport. The aircraft, carrying 242 passengers of mixed nationalities, sent a Mayday call before the devastating crash. Rescue teams have pulled one survivor from the wreckage, while confirming fatalities both on the plane and on the ground.

title: Trump on Ahmedabad crash: ‘They’ll handle it’; calls it among worst in history
content: US President Donald Trump expressed his condolences following the Ahmedabad plane crash, calling it a “horrific crash.” He offered immediate American assistance to India, emphasizing their readiness to help. Trump speculated on the possible cause, suggesting potential engine failure while acknowledging the ongoing investigation.

title: Meghalaya honeymoon murder: Raj actual mastermind; aides killed as ‘favour’
content: Police have identified Raj Kushwaha as the mastermind behind the murder of Raja Raghuvanshi, revealing it was a favor, not a contract killing. Raja's wife, Sonam, played a key role in the plot, which was planned since February. Raja's body was found in Meghalaya, and Sonam later surrendered, with Kushwaha and others apprehended in connection to the crime.

title: 'Let us not forget ... Laden': MEA rebuts US general's endorsement of Pakistan
content: India has strongly criticized the United States' description of Pakistan as a counter-terrorism ally, citing Islamabad's history of supporting cross-border terrorism. The MEA highlighted the recent Pahalgam attack as a reminder of Pakistan's role in harboring terrorists.

title: Paul over Chavez? Teo vs. Haney? Pacquiao champ again?
content: Andreas Hale and Nick Parkinson discuss these topics and look at Vasiliy Lomachenko's career, and George Kambosos' return.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Napoli eye move for Liverpool's Darwin Núñez
content: Napoli are keeping tabs on a possible move for Liverpool striker Darwin Núñez. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Men's summer transfer grades: Man City get an A- for Reijnders
content: The window is open, clubs are doing business and players are on the move. Here is how we rate the biggest deals.

title: Ahmedabad plane crash: Police find one survivor in seat 11A; 242 were onboard
content: An Air India Boeing 787 Dreamliner, carrying 242 people, crashed in a residential area of Ahmedabad shortly after takeoff on Thursday afternoon. The London-bound flight (AI171) went down near Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport, causing a large fire. While initial reports suggested no survivors, authorities confirmed one person, Ramesh Vishwakumar, was found alive and is receiving treatment.

title: Mets star Francisco Alvarez becomes a dad for the first time
content: New York Mets catcher Francisco Alvarez and his wife Nahomi welcomed their first child, a daughter, on June 12, 2025. Alvarez was placed on the paternity list, causing him to miss a few games. The proud father shared a heartwarming photo on Instagram, celebrated by fans and the team alike, after a standout performance against the Colorado Rockies.

title: Ahmedabad air crash: Ex-Gujarat CM Vijay Rupani among victims, confirms BJP
content: Former Gujarat Chief Minister and BJP leader Vijay Rupani tragically died in the Air India plane crash in Ahmedabad shortly after takeoff, confirmed by top BJP leaders. Rupani was en route to London to visit his family when the accident occurred. The crash involved 242 individuals, including passengers and crew, marking a significant loss for the BJP and Indian politics.

title: Ahmedabad plane crash: Air India CEO reacts; says ‘A difficult day for us’
content: Air India's CEO, Campbell Wilson, expressed deep sorrow following the crash of a Boeing 787-8 shortly after takeoff from Ahmedabad, bound for London, carrying 242 onboard. The aircraft crashed into a residential area, causing numerous casualties.

title: Ahmedabad plane crash: AI to arrange relief flights from Delhi, Mumbai- details
content: An Air India Dreamliner 787-8, flight AI 171 carrying 242 people to London, tragically crashed in Ahmedabad shortly after takeoff. The airline is arranging relief flights from Delhi and Mumbai for families.

title: AI flight crashed into doctors' hostel, many feared dead
content: An Air India Boeing 787 Dreamliner, flight AI171 to London, crashed shortly after takeoff from Ahmedabad's Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport on Thursday. The plane, carrying 232 passengers and 10 crew members, went down in Meghaninagar, impacting residential quarters of doctors from BJ Medical College.

title: Air India crash latest test for new Boeing leadership
content: A central factor in both MAX crashes was the Manoeuvring Characteristics Augmentation System (MCAS), a flight handling system that badly malfunctioned, pointing to design flaws.

title: From silver screen to Parliament: journey of Tamil actors to Rajya Sabha
content: Kamal Haasan is the eighth Tamil film actor to make the transition from the silver screen to the House of Elders

title: Building bridges to Kashmir
content: Srinagar is now closer to the rest of India with the newly inaugurated Udhampur-Srinagar-Baramulla link, of which the stretch from Jammu and Kashmir’s capital to Katra is ready. Peerzada Ashiq takes the train and speaks to those travelling on it to understand what the Vande Bharat Express means to people in the Valley. With 36 tunnels, the world’s highest railway arch bridge, and India’s first cable-stayed railway bridge, it is an engineering landmark that showcases the natural heritage of India’s northernmost region

title: Survivor of Air India crash jumped out of emergency exit, police say
content: Speaking from his hospital bed, the 40-year-old told Indian media that he was a British national and was travelling to Britain with his brother after visiting family in India

title: SIMS Hospital performs India’s first combined TAVR and aortic graft surgery in a redo heart procedure
content: This is the first time in India that TAVR and Frozen Elephant Trunk (FET) procedures were successfully combined in a single surgery for a patient with a previous Bentall operation, reducing the risks of multiple interventions and improving patient safety

title: Karnataka govt. plans annual art contest for students, general public in Bengaluru
content: A budget of ₹25 crore will be allocated for the event, says Deputy CM D.K. Shivakumar announced at the inauguration of the renovated Venkatappa Art Gallery in Bengaluru

title: Team from Ministry of Jal Shakti reviews water projects in Chennai for National Water Awards
content: Officials from the Water Resources Department noted that Tamil Nadu has been shortlisted for the award

title: 76.14% students pass SSC Advanced Supplementary examinations in A.P.
content: Girls secure pass percentage of 80.10%, which is 6.55% higher than boys; Prakasam district tops the State with 98.24% success rate, West Godavari district records the lowest of 50.24%; time till June 19 to apply for recounting, reverification

title: How can police expect UIDAI to compare fingerprints of dead with Aadhaar biometrics of over 100 crore people? asks HC judge
content: Justice P. Velmurugan dismisses a petition filed by Tindivanam DSP seeking a direction to UIDAI to provide biometric information related to an unclaimed body

title: Bombay High Court stays SC, ST, OBC reservations in minority institutions for class 11 admissions
content: The court passed the order on a bunch of petitions moved by Maharashtra Association of Minority Educational Institutions, along with prominent colleges such as, Jai Hind, KC College, St. Xavier’s, Walchand College of Arts and Science and Hirachand Nemchand College of Commerce

title: Akram Pasha takes charge as KSRTC Managing Director
content: Pasha’s appointment comes at a time when KSRTC and other transport corporations in Karnataka are facing a significant financial crunch

title: NIA searches 15 locations in Punjab, Haryana in Babbar Khalsa-linked grenade attack case
content: Accused Harpreet Singh claimed responsibility for multiple attacks; U.S.-based operatives, narco-terror links under scanner

title: Modi-Carney meeting on G7 sidelines to focus on bilateral reset: MEA
content: Engagement to address mutual concerns; law enforcement dialogue on Khalistan issue to continue, says Jaiswal

title: Maharashtra Minister bats for MNS-BJP alliance after Raj Thackeray meets Fadnavis
content: The meeting comes amid ongoing buzz about a possible reconciliation between the estranged Thackeray cousins — Raj and Uddhav Thackeray, who heads the Shiv Sena (UBT)

title: Anti-ragging regulations: UGC serves show cause notices to seven varsities in Karnataka
content: Indian Institute of Management Bangalore (IIMB) and Bengaluru City University are among those served the notices

title: What made Boeing 787s popular – and later a cause for concern
content: Before the crash, Trump’s nominee to head the U.S. Federal Aviation Administration vowed to hold Boeing accountable over the 737 Max

title: West Bengal School Service Commission holds talks with ‘sacked’ teachers
content: Hundreds of ‘untainted’ teachers, who lost their jobs after an April 3 Supreme Court order invalidating nearly 26,000 teaching and non-teaching jobs, gathered at Karunamoyee in Bidhannagar and marched to the WBSSC office

title: More feeder buses likely on Thripunithura metro station-Infopark stretch
content: An air-conditioned CNG feeder bus has begun service on the route; eight daily services planned to improve last-mile connectivity to Infopark

title: Experts, govt. officials call for urgent need for ecosystem restoration in West Bengal
content: Senior officials call for partnerships with academia and corporates to combat climate change and biodiversity loss

title: Israel Conducts Preemptive Strike On Iran, Declares State Of Emergency
content: Israel launched a "preemptive strike" on Iran, the country's defence minister said early Friday, after US President Donald Trump had warned that Israel could soon strike Iran's nuclear sites.

title: Air India Crash: Pilots Sent "Mayday" Call, Then Silence
content: A "Mayday" distress call was issued by Air India's AI 171 flight, minutes before it crashed after taking off from Gujarat's Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport on Thursday.

title: 241 Dead In Ahmedabad Plane Crash, 1 Survived: Air India
content: An Air India Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner carrying 242 people crashed immediately after taking off from Ahmedabad airport. The flight was going to London.

title: Marco Rubio Says US Not Involved In Israeli Strikes Against Iran
content: U.S. Secretary of State Marco Rubio said on Thursday the United States was not involved in Israel's strikes against Iran while also urging Tehran not to target U.S. interests or personnel in the region.

title: "Heard Loud Noise 30 Seconds Into Flight": Air India Dreamliner Crash Survivor
content: An Indian-origin British national survived the Air India plane crash in Gujarat's Ahmedabad today, officials have said. Ahmedabad Police Commissioner GS Malik told news agency ANI that the survivor was found in seat No. 11A.

title: North Korea Relaunches Damaged Destroyer: Report
content: A North Korean naval destroyer damaged in a botched launch last month has been relaunched, with leader Kim Jong Un presiding over the ceremony, South Korean news agency Yonhap reported early Friday, citing the North's state media.

title: Working Closely With NASA To Address Axiom 4 Delay, Says ISRO
content: Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) is working closely with Axiom Space, NASA, SpaceX as they responsibly address the ISS Zvezda module observation causing the Ax-4 delay.

title: Israel Could Strike Iran As Soon As Sunday: Report
content: Israel is prepared to attack Iran in the coming days if Tehran rejects a U.S. proposal to limit its nuclear program, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, citing U.S. and Israeli officials.

title: US Lawmakers Approve $9 Billion Of Elon Musk's Federal Cuts
content: US lawmakers on Thursday approved a White House request to claw back $9.4 billion from funding already allocated by Congress in a victory for President Donald Trump as he pushes to lock in spending cuts spearheaded by tech billionaire Elon Musk.

title: US Sees No Immediate Reason To Ground Boeing 787 After Air India Crash
content: U.S. officials said on Thursday they have not seen any immediate safety data that would require halting Boeing 787 flights after a fatal Air India accident killed over 240 people.

title: Iran Must End Nuclear Weapon Ambitions: Trump Ahead Of Next Round Of Talks
content: President Donald Trump on Thursday said the United States remains committed to resolving the Iran nuclear issue through diplomacy, but added that the Islamic Republic must first give up hopes of building a nuclear weapon.

title: Watch: California Senator Handcuffed, Forcibly Removed From LA Press Conference
content: California's stand-off with President Donald Trump's administration ratcheted up Thursday, after a sitting US senator was handcuffed and forcibly removed from a press conference on controversial immigration raids that have spurred days of protests.

title: World Leaders May Face Wildfire Smoke At Canada G7 Summit
content: World leaders may face smoke warnings when they gather next week in Alberta as wildfires burned out of control across much of Canada and caused the country's second-worst fire season in decades.

title: Video Emerges Of First Survivor Walking After Ahmedabad Plane Crash
content: The horrific plane crash in Ahmedabad this afternoon that had apparently left no survivors, has sprung a miracle. Within hours of their "No survivor" statement, the Ahmedabad police confirmed that one person has survived the crash.

title: NDTV Ground Report: Suitcases Strewn, Food Uneaten At Hostel After Gujarat Crash
content: At the BJ Medical College in Ahmedabad, suitcases lays strewn about in the hostel mess, windows were broken and plates of food remained untouched on tables.

title: Air India Ahmedabad-London Plane Crash: What We Know So Far
content: An Air India Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner operating as Flight AI171 from Ahmedabad to London's Gatwick Airport crashed shortly after takeoff this afternoon. The aircraft was carrying 232 passengers and 10 crew members.

title: 4.6 Magnitude Earthquake Hits Pakistan, No Casualties Reported
content: An earthquake of magnitude 4.6 jolted Pakistan, a statement by the National Center for Seismology (NCS) said.

title: 5 Students, Doctor, Woman Killed, Over 60 Injured As Plane Crashes Into Hostel
content: At least five MBBS students, one PG resident doctor and the wife of a superspecialist doctor of the BJ Medical College in Ahmedabad were killed and over 60 medical students injured when an Air India plane crashed into the college complex.

title: He Was My Uncle's Son: Actor Vikrant Massey On Co-Pilot Of Plane That Crashed
content: After the horrific crash in Ahmedabad, actor Vikrant Massey has condoled the death of the first officer of the plane, who was the son of his uncle, and the other 240 people feared dead, saying his "heart breaks" for the families.

title: Farmers Celebrate As Tamil Nadu Releases Mettur Water On Due Date
content: Tamil Nadu Chief Minister MK Stalin released waters from the Mettur Dam today to irrigate the delta region. The water would help the Kuruvai crop across the 12 delta districts including Thanjavur, Nagapattinam and Tiruvarur.

title: Ahead of Bihar polls, INDIA bloc says it will expose ‘failures’ of Nitish Kumar’s govt.
content: Bihar Janata Dal (United) president Umesh Singh Kushwaha hits back saying that the “so-called unity” of the alliance is based on the weak foundations of ‘selfishness and opportunism’

title: Revised DPR for elevated highway on Edappally-Aroor bypass not yet ready
content: Decision pending on alignment near flyovers and metro viaduct stalls finalisation of revised project report; NHAI yet to decide between planned trumpet flyover and expansive clover-leaf design at Nettoor

title: Ahmedabad air crash: Overloading, ‘bird hit’ among probable causes, say experts
content: “The odds of both engines failing simultaneously during take-off are quite small or about one in a billion,” says Abhay Pashilkar, Director, CSIR-National Aerospace Laboratories

title: Plane crash: Railways to run two special trains from Ahmedabad to Mumbai and Delhi
content: Bookings for trains 09497, 09494 and 09493 are open on Tatkal basis at passenger reservation system counters and IRCTC website. The train calendars can be checked on www.enquiry.indianrail.gov.in.

title: Naidu slams Jagan, says harm to law and order, public safety will not be tolerated
content: CM accuses YSRCP president of stirring up trouble in Podili to divert attention from their comments on Amaravati

title: India condemns vandalism at Tagore’s ancestral home in Bangladesh
content: MEA terms June 8 incident ‘despicable’, urges Dhaka to act against extremists targeting cultural symbols

title: Flight AI 171 crash akin to crash of Emperor Ashoka, 47 years ago
content: Air India Flight AI 855, named Emperor Ashoka, a Boeing 747-237 B crashed into Arabian Sea soon after take-off from Mumbai airport on January 1, 1978

title: Eleven from Rajasthan among victims of Air India crash after take-off from Ahmedabad
content: Five-member physician’s family from Banswara, marble trader’s children from Udaipur among those on board

title: Two cabin crew members from Manipur onboard crashed Air India flight in Gujarat
content: Families of Kongbrailatpam Nganthoi Sharma and Lamnunthem Singson await updates as uncertainty prevails

title: Condolences pour in for victims of Ahmedabad air crash
content: Country’s leadership stands united in grief; President Droupadi Murmu called it a “heart-rending” disaster

title: Education system in Telangana in bad shape under Cong: BRS
content: Party leader R.S. Praveen Kumar alleges that the State Govt. intentionally neglecting residential schools in the name of Young India

title: Heavy rain batters twin cities, inundates arterial roads and low-lying areas
content: II PU exam goes on as per schedule even as holiday has been declared for anganwadis, schools and colleges on Friday also

title: Beleaguered KMRL forced to explore ways to restore discount cards for students
content: The metro agency withdrew ‘Vidya’ passes on April 1 without notice; MP says the move hit student budgets and worsened delays during peak hours amid congestion from extension works

title: Operation Sindoor exposed China, Türkiye as threat to country’s sovereignty and trade: Swadeshi Jagran Manch
content: Launching a pan-India drive to create awareness about use of ‘swadeshi’  goods, the RSS-backed outfit says it will ‘awaken people’ about domination of e-commerce websites in the Indian market causing heavy losses to local traders

title: Grassroots initiative in Pune district records over 350 wildlife sightings in six months
content: Farmers and herders in Purandar taluk aid conservation efforts by monitoring non-protected grasslands under ‘Wildlife Watchers’ programme

title: Gen Z slang takes over: are you in or out ?
content: Expressions such as pookie, rizz, aura, bussin, and diva dominate the daily conversations of Generation Z,  making it impossible for anyone outside their bubble to keep up with or escape their “unserious” vocabulary

title: UDF tries out Selfie to bond with the grassroots in Nilambur
content: Artistes under Congress’s Samskara Sahiti join UDF campaign, come out with a street play ‘exposing government failures and ministerial infighting’. Satire is used deftly to deliver ‘unpleasant messages.’

title: Boeing 787 Dreamliner and its history of failures | Explained
content: Over 200 people have died as an Air India Boeing 787 aircraft crashed minutes after departing from Ahmedabad airport

title: CAG to involve experts from empanelled CA firms for auditing of autonomous bodies
content: An official says this decision has been taken in view of the limited technical resources available with the institution vis-a-vis the vast audit landscape in this area

title: CSBC to conduct six-phase written examination for 19,838 constable posts in Bihar from July 16
content: Over 16.7 lakh valid applications received; examination to be held across all 38 districts amid stringent security and surveillance

title: Karnataka to seek increase in devolution funds under 16th Finance Commission
content: Chief Minister Siddaramaiah, who also holds the Finance portfolio, and his economic adviser and MLA Basavaraja Rayareddy, and senior officials would participate in the meeting on Friday

title: Naidu launches ‘Talliki Vandanam’, ₹10,091 crore to be disbursed for 67 lakh students
content: CM hands over related G.O.s to HRD Minister Lokesh, marking one year of NDA government; says all Super Six promises being implemented

title: Authorities decide to commence land acquisition for Sabari rail
content: A high-level meeting convened by the State government directs the District Collectors of Ernakulam, Idukki and Kottayam to proceed with acquiring required land

title: Ship on fire casts a pall of gloom over Kerala coast
content: MV Wan Hai 503, the Singapore-flagged cargo ship, catches fire nearly 44 nautical miles off the Azhikkal coast in Kerala, raising concerns about marine biodiversity and maritime safety. A.S. Jayanth speaks to experts to gauge the impacts of the accident, the second one in a fortnight in the State

title: Rail users seek early introduction of passenger train on Karaikal-Peralam line
content: Southern Railway also urged to extend the Tirupati-Villupuram train to Karaikal to provide rail connectivity to the popular pilgrim centres of Tiruvannamalai and Thirunallar

title: West Bengal clashes: Tension lingers in the lanes of Rabindra Nagar; locals reel in the aftermath
content: Streets tense in Rabindra Nagar as vandalism, stone-pelting and arson leave trail of destruction; senior officials claim situation under control

title: Thrissur ups measures for monsoon preparedness; review meet held
content: As many as four deaths reported in the district in rain-related incidents. Four houses completely destroyed and 194 partially damaged

title: Padiyur double murder accused found dead in Kedarnath, say Uttarakhand police
content: He is accused of killing his wife and mother-in-law on June 4. Thrissur police team camping in Delhi sets out for Kedarnath

title: Ahmedabad air crash: Praful Patel, a former Civil Aviation Minister, defends India’s ‘robust’ safety monitoring system
content: Mr. Patel says Boeing 787 Dreamliner aircraft are ‘workhorses’ when it came to long-haul flights and that only a detailed inquiry can shed light on the cause of the Ahmedabad plane crash

title: Govt. sanctions ₹36 crore for establishment of  centre for energy and cyber resilience in Amaravati
content: It will be established in collaboration with the World Economic Forum under its Centre for the Fourth Industrial Revolution Network with a long-term vision to position the State as a global hub for innovation, clean energy, and responsible digital transformation, says Chief Secretary Vijayanand

title: Kerala State IT mission organises AI conference
content: Kerala State IT Mission and partners host K-AI conference to promote AI solutions for governance challenges.

title: Commander of Sri Lankan Army visits South Western Command
content: Lt Gen Rodrigo and Lt Gen Manjinder Singh discussed regional security, joint training exercises and more, the Defence Ministry said

title: Central schemes must pass ‘effectiveness’ test to continue
content: Every scheme must have a “sunset date”, says FinMin; imposes new funding curbs, including on demand-driven schemes like MGNREGA, which will need approval to add beneficiaries beyond projected numbers

title: Public, political groups urged to avoid protests in sensitive cases
content: Any attempts of miscreants taking law into their own hands during the protests will be dealt with sternly, says Sri Sathya Sai SP

title: How all 68 Power 4 college football teams stack up

title: New for Club World Cup, Gold Cup: No more GK time-wasting?
content: the club world cup and the concacaf gold cup kick off on saturday . the two competitions are being held in the united states . a few laws have been tweaked to make the tournament a little different .

title: All the best shots and moments from the 2025 U.S. Open first round
content: The 125th U.S. Open teed off Thursday morning at Oakmont Country Club just outside of Pittsburgh. It's the 10th time Oakmont has hosted the U.S. Open and it figures to be one of the toughest tests in recent years. After the first round,  J.J. Spaun  led the pack, carding a 4-under 66 -- one of 10 players to finish below par on the event's first day. We have all of the best action from the first round of the 2025 tournament.

title: Grading the Rangers, Ducks on the Chris Kreider trade
content: the Rangers sent Chris Kreider and a 2025 fourth-round pick to the Ducks . the new york Rangers could find a replacement elsewhere . there were many reasons that influenced the decision to move on .

title: PLL Power Rankings ahead of Week 3: Who's No. 1?
content: 2-0 Marcus Holman's dive shot at the buzzer gave the Boston Cannons a 9-8 win over the Utah Archers . current record: 1-1 The firepower was lacking last week in a Saturday loss to Boston . Connor Fields, the hero of Week 1, had just two shots on 25 touches .

title: City legend De Bruyne joins Napoli as free agent
content: Kevin De Bruyne has joined Serie A champions Napoli as a free agent . the 33-year-old was the subject of interest from clubs in the premier league, Germany and MLS . he made his final appearance for city against Fulham at Craven Cottage on the final day of the season .
